body_html:
You ran configure with TF_UNOFFICIAL_SETTING, right?

On Thu, Jan 7, 2016 at 10:36 PM Hamid Bazargani notifications@github.com
wrote:

One more update:
config.device_count_size() returns 0 at run-time??

—
